Class LayerMemoryReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.memory.MemoryReport
      • org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.memory.LayerMemoryReport

  • public class LayerMemoryReport
extends MemoryReport
    A MemoryReport Designed to report estimated memory use for a single layer or graph vertex.
